resources.string: For Justin Timberlake its the final two dates of his Experience World Tour at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas. Surrounded by the 25 band members of The Tennessee Kids and featuring show-stopping performances from one of the highest-grossing tours of the decade, the film is a culmination of the singerâ€™s 134 shows and 2 years on the road.
